title: Electrical System Installation
description: Install battery pack, wiring harness, controller, and all electrical components for the electric drive system.

steps.title: Battery Tray Installation
steps.instructions: Install battery mounting tray and secure with Grade 8 hardware. Ensure proper drainage holes are clear.

safetyWarnings.text: Battery tray must be level to prevent acid leaks.

knowledgeChecks.question: Before connecting batteries, you must:
knowledgeChecks.explanation: Always verify polarity three times before connecting batteries.
